tud.tangram.svgplot.data.trendline

Class MovingAverageTrendline

  • java.lang.Object
    • tud.tangram.svgplot.data.trendline.MovingAverageTrendline
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrendLineAlgorithm

    public class MovingAverageTrendline
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrendLineAlgorithm
    Calculates a trend line using the moving average filter. The average is calculated from each point and it n neighbours to the left and to the right. Assumes that all points have the same distance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MovingAverageTrendline(int n)
      Constructor setting the size of the filter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      PointListList.PointList calculateTrendLine(PointListList.PointList originalPoints)
      Calculate a trend line from the given points using the moving average filter.

      • MovingAverageTrendline

        public MovingAverageTrendline(int n)
        Constructor setting the size of the filter.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • calculateTrendLine

        public PointListList.PointList calculateTrendLine(PointListList.PointList originalPoints)
        Calculate a trend line from the given points using the moving average filter. Fails if there are less than 2n+2 points specified.
        Specified by:
        calculateTrendLine in interface TrendLineAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        originalPoints - the original points
        Returns:
        a new PointListList.PointList if successful or null
